name: Enemy Hammer, Mythic
text: The target becomes entangled whether or not it succeeds at its saving throw. When using the target as a weapon, add half your tier to your attack roll, and add your tier to the damage roll.

sections.name: Augmented (3rd)
sections.text: If you expend two uses of mythic power, when you use the target to hit a creature, you can attempt a free bull rush combat maneuver against that creature. Your CMB for this maneuver is equal to your attack bonus for mythic enemy hammer, except you add your tier instead of half your tier.
